articles.title: Ambani wedding: India tycoon’s son to marry after months of festivities - BBC.com
articles.description: Anant Ambani, son of Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani, will tie the knot with Radhika Merchant in Mumbai.
articles.content:
By Zoya Mateen, BBC News, Delhi  Meryl Sebastian, BBC News, Kochi
Anant Ambani is marrying his long-time girlfriend Radhika Merchant
Reality TV star Kim Kardashian and former UK PM Tony Blair are a… [+4641 chars]
